product.title: WHAT ITS LIKE TO WORK AT LYRIC

items.title: GOOD TIMES, POSITIVE ENERGY, LETS GOOOO
items.description: with the right attitude you'll be in charge of your life

items.title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER, AT LYRIC WE'RE A FAMILY
items.description: With Lyric we insist on positive energy and a positive outlook on life and business success

features.title: TOP PAYMENT IN THE ENTIRE INDUSTRY!
features.subtitle: NOONE GETS PAID MORE OR HAS MORE FUN IN THE PROCESS
features.description: As a top-tier sales company, the quality of work is defined by a customer-centric ethos and a commitment to excellence. The sales team excels in building strong client relationships through effective communication and active listening, ensuring that their solutions precisely align with client needs. This customer-focused approach is complemented by a culture of continuous improvement

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
